Soy Shredded Tri-tip

instant pot
beef

Ingredients

Tri-Tip

  • 2-3 lbs tri tip roast
  • 1/3 cup soy sauce
  • 1/4 cup white vinegar
  • 1/4 cup olive oil
  • 1/4 cup Worcestershire sauce
  • 1 tbsp minced garlic
  • 1 tsp oregano
  • 1 tsp dried basil
  • 1 tsp onion powder
  • 2 tsp brown sugar

Procedure

  1. Chunk tri-tip into roughly 2" pieces
  2. pressure cook on high for 45 minutes
  3. 10 minutes natural release
  4. shred meat
  5. bring cooking liquid to simmer and reduce slightly
  6. ladle some cooking liquid back over shredded beef
